cr.title: Iraq War Resolution
cr.excerpt: I thank the gentleman from New York for yielding. Mr. Speaker, as President Bush and his top military advisers implement the new plan for victory in Iraq, we must be united in a common goal for victory, and we should never forget that our enemy is listening to this debate, just as our troops are listening to every word of every Member of...

cr.title: International Solid Waste Importation and Management Act of 2007
cr.excerpt: Madam Speaker, I rise today to speak on H.R. 518, introduced by Chairman John Dingell from Michigan. Madam Speaker, H.R. 518 is going to be considered under "suspension of the rules" which is usually reserved for non-controversial bills, but it has come to my attention that there are some strong objections both from the Canadian Embassy...
